LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Soft_Subordinate.label: relaxed
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Soft_Subordinate.descript: {GENDER} members will be pleased when wearing {APPAREL_indefinite}. {GENDER} members will arrive wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} if it doesn't interfere with any other apparel.
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Strong_Subordinate.label: strong
LanguageData.ApparelDesired_Strong_Subordinate.descri: {GENDER} members will be pleased when wearing {APPAREL_indefinite}. {GENDER} members will arrive wearing {APPAREL_indefinite} unless it interferes with armor.
